page.title: 14LEISURE
page.content: Leisure choice is wide with activities to suit most people. For adults there are the Community Centres, the Libraries, the Public Houses, cafes and restaurants. For children there are Youth Clubs, Scouts and Brownies, dancing classes and Red Cross. Many residents find wider opportunities which are available in Brighton. Much outdoor recreation is geared to summertime. People of all ages choose tennis, bowling, swimming or Cricket Matches at Rottingdean, which has been active since 1758. The beaches are some of the most attractive in the vicinity. Many residents enjoy the undercliff walk or a game of 'pitch and putt' near the windmill.
